p.s: In the Moviemovie The Hate U Give directed by George Tillmann Jr. and published in 2018 is about systematic racism by a 16-year-old girl called Starr Carter.
The given scene deals with Starr and Chris, who are in a Relationshiprelationship, in the school and Chris makes Starr laugh.
The given sequence could be divided into four parts.
In the first part Chris goes on the school flourfloor and Starr looks at him.
But she looks away, after he saw Starr, because she was still angry about the argument before.
In the next part Chris puts his earphones on Starr and he is sorry about the passage, (where he got in an argument with her).
In the third part Chris makes Starr laugh, because he dances to his music and he is just himself (he does not change).
In the last part Starr and Chris are alone and laugh.
